articles.title: President Ramaphosa tells 'adamant' Putin 'the war must end' in Ukraine - Africanews English
articles.description: Putin reiterated his position that Ukraine and its Western allies had started the conflict long before Russia sent its armed forces over the border in February last year, something they deny.
articles.content:
South African President Cyril Ramaphosa, who is in Russia as part of a peace-seeking delegation, on Saturday, told his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin that the conflict in Ukraine had to stop.

articles.title: Celebrating Juneteenth on the SS Victory ship - KRON 4
articles.description: This Monday marks Juneteenth, a federal holiday commemorating the emancipation of enslaved African Americans.Here in the Bay Area, various events are planned...

articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Ukraine war must be settled: South Africa's Ramaphosa tells Putin - India Today
articles.description: After his talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Saturday, South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa said, "This war must be settled... through negotiations and through diplomatic means," as he spoke about the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
articles.content: By Agence France-Presse: South Africa's president, in Russia as part of a delegation pushing for peace between Kyiv and Moscow, told his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin on Saturday that the fighti… [+5570 chars]
